title: Covalent organic polyrotaxanes based on β-cyclodextrin for iodine capture
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30077-30083
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05339G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xia Guo, Jie Yu, Lianru Ma, Jingsong Yuan, Taoyan Guo, Yingying Ma, Shengshun Xiao, Jingkun Bai, Baolong Zhou
Covalent organic polyrotaxanes (COPRs) were concurrently prepared via the integration of dynamic covalent imine-bond formation with supramolecular self-assembly and targeted introduction of β-cyclodextrin into the three-dimensional porous skeleton.
